question: The speed of a boat in still water is 10 km/hr. It covers (upstream) a distance of 45 km in 6 hours. The speed (in km/hr) of the stream is :
explanation:
Upstream speed of boat = $latex \\frac{Distance}{Time}=\\frac{45}{6}=\\frac{15}{2}&s=1$
                       =7.5 kmph
Speed Of Current = 10-7.5 = 2.5 kmph
Hence option [D] is the right answer.
